main event: A resident of Covington, Indiana reported seeing a bright, circular object moving across the sky on November 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 40-50 feet in diameter and emitting a pulsating, white light.
The object hovered silently for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from view.
Attempts to photograph the object were unsuccessful, resulting in blurry and inconclusive images.
Multiple witnesses reported seeing the same or a similar object in the sky at the time of the incident.
The case was investigated by Project Blue Book but remained classified as 'unresolved' due to the lack of definitive evidence.
